display_name: Overall RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with arousal or >= 5% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba5 + hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 + carba5 + caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation or arousal
